I am currently the Data Scientist at the Dangote Industries Limited and I also served as the Analytics faculty member with BNet Learning. - Environmental Statistics - Geocomputation - Machine Learning - Data Science - Experimental Design - Mobile Data Collection ### Data Stack ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Data Tool Box**\ - R \| Python \| Julia \| SQL \| Excel \| ODK
::: text-end ::: ::: ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Development Environments**\ - Rstudio \| Jupyter \| VS Code \| Pluto \| Literate Programming with Quarto and Rmarkdown
::: text-end ::: ::: ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Databases**\ - PostgreSQL \| Elasticsearch
::: text-end ::: ::: ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**BI Tools**\ - PowerBI \| Looker Studio \| Tableau \| Kibana
::: text-end ::: ::: ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Operating Systems**\ - Windows \| Ubuntu \| CentOS
::: text-end ::: ::: ### Education ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**University of Ibadan**\ MSc in Statistics\ Advisor: Prof. K.O. Obisesan
::: text-end Ibadan, Nigeria Granted March 2015 ::: ::: - Dissertation: *Extreme Value Model for Rainfall Distribution* - Research Area: Environmental Statistics - Obtained PhD Grade ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Federal University of Technology, Akure**\ B.Tech in Industrial Mathematics
::: text-end Akure, Nigeria\ Granted September 2010 ::: ::: ### Experience ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Dangote Industries Limited**
::: text-end 2022 - present ::: ::: *Data Scientist* - Orchestrated a data pipeline from a third party system. - Implemented an extensive ETL process. - Continuous mining of the transformed data. - Developed and monitor ML models using `tidymodels` methodology in `R`. ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Longbridge Technologies Limited**
::: text-end 2019 - 2021 ::: ::: *Head, Business Transformation & Operational Excellence* - Worked in a cross-functional environment with various business groups, and end-users to identify, document, and communicate business processes. - Created a system to evaluate the success of any adjustments made within the organization and present findings. - Communicated strategies and objectives with relevant departments and colleagues. ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**eHealth Systems Africa**
::: text-end 2017 - 2018 ::: ::: *Data Scientist* - Developed models to discover the patterns and information in vast amounts of spatial and non-spatial data across several programs at eHA to support better programmatic decisions, intervention planning and improved information products. - Applied data mining techniques, performed statistical analysis, and build high quality prediction models that formed core of eHA's information products on disease surveillance in particular. ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Venture Garden Group**
::: text-end 2016-2017 ::: ::: *Data Scientist* - Lead discovery processes with Institute stakeholders to identify the business requirements and the expected outcome. - Conducted advanced data analysis and complex designs algorithm. - Applied advanced statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build, maintain, and improve on multiple real-time decision systems. - Validated analysis using scenario modeling. ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Computer Warehouse Group, Plc**
::: text-end 2013-2016 ::: ::: *Quality Assurance Analyst* - Encouraged factual approach to decision making by providing the management an accurate analysis of people and processes. - Achieved success in providing standard value-added metrics for business model. - Conducted quality spot checks of project implementations & Services (Software, Hardware, Communication). - Provided both administrative and analytic support to departments in order to manage critical and people sensitive projects. - Collaborated with the VP of Sales in the development of sales forecasts and projections. - Summarized and report performance against sales quotas to all sales personnel in a timely manner. - Proactively prepare and deliver ad hoc customer analysis to sales team members and senior management. ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
**Practical Sampling International**
::: text-end 2012-2013 ::: ::: *Data Analyst* - Supervised the data collection process of many high profile projects. - Processed and analyzed raw data collected from field work. - Improved the statistical procedure usage and reporting method. ### Teaching #### Codementor.io ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between}
Data Analytics Mentor
